abstract.t: Versioning and configuration management are important features forontrolling the evolution of remotely authored Web content. Paralleldevelopment leverages versioning capability to allow multiple authors tosimultaneously author Web content. These functions form a basis forflexible, scaleable distributed authoring. This document describes a setof scenarios, functional, and non-functional requirements for webversioning extensions to the WebDAV protocol. It supersedes theversioning-related goals of [WEBDAV-GOALS].
